name: Kane Property Management
overview:
With over 30 years of experience, the leadership team at Kane Property Management understands the Chicagoland market. These professionals share the desire of their clients for excellent, secure properties that have the best the Windy City has to offer. Through cost effective planning and problem solving expertise, this company meets the needs of all of its condominium association clients. Individual attention is paid to each property group and customized management programs are implemented.

Kane Property Management is familiar with the Near North Side, especially the Gold Coast and Streeterville neighborhoods. The company specializes in finding cost-effective solutions for condo and cooperative associations that benefit building and unit owners. Kane Property Management strongly believes in customer service and demonstrates this through its careful selection of maintenance and property management personnel. Whether they are historic buildings or brand new ones, Kane Property Management has the expertise to help direct successful condominium and cooperative association operations.
